title: Easy Lemon Berry Sauce
directions: Puree all ingredients together in blender. Serve immediately.

Serve over your favorite angel food, pound or cheese cake. Fill plain or chocolate pastry cups. Pour sauce into a squeeze bottle to swirl on dessert plates or over desserts for an elegant presentation.
ingredients: 1/2 (10 ounce) jar Dickinson's Pure Marion Blackberry Preserves or any berry flavor Dickinson's Preserves or Purely Fruit Spreadable Fruit
